description:
Determined to retire but unwilling to leave his guild without a successor, Kikuru trains a few heroines as apprentices. But between their personalities and monsters with an… unusual interest in women? His retirement is getting further away every day.

(Source: HIDIVE)
synonyms: กิลด์ป่วนก๊วนฮา

tags.name: Nudity
tags.description: Features a character wearing no clothing or exposing intimate body parts.

tags.name: Primarily Female Cast
tags.description: Main cast is mostly composed of female characters.

tags.name: Heterosexual
tags.description: Prominently features a romance between a man and a woman, not inherently sexual.

tags.name: Slapstick
tags.description: Prominently features comedy based on deliberately clumsy actions or embarrassing events.

tags.name: Large Breasts
tags.description: Features a character with larger-than-average breasts.

tags.name: Female Harem
tags.description: Main cast features the protagonist plus several female characters who are romantically interested in them.

tags.name: Male Protagonist
tags.description: Main character is male.

tags.name: Magic
tags.description: Prominently features magical elements or the use of magic.

tags.name: Primarily Teen Cast
tags.description: Main cast is mostly composed of teen characters.

tags.name: Ensemble Cast
tags.description: Features a large cast of characters with (almost) equal screen time and importance to the plot.

tags.name: Anachronism
tags.description: Prominently features elements that are out of place in the historical period the work takes place in, particularly modern elements in a historical setting.

tags.name: Kemonomimi
tags.description: Prominently features humanoid characters with animal ears.

tags.name: Rural
tags.description: Partly or completely set in the countryside.

tags.name: Shounen
tags.description: Target demographic is teenage and young adult males.

tags.name: Mixed Gender Harem
tags.description: Main cast features the protagonist plus several people, regardless of gender, who are romantically interested in them.

tags.name: Fitness
tags.description: Centers around exercise with the aim of improving physical health.

tags.name: Demons
tags.description: Prominently features malevolent otherworldly creatures.

tags.name: Archery
tags.description: Centers around the sport of archery, or prominently features the use of archery in combat.

tags.name: Elf
tags.description: Prominently features a character who is an elf.

tags.name: Femboy
tags.description: Features a boy who exhibits characteristics or behaviors considered in many cultures to be typical of girls.

tags.name: Tsundere
tags.description: Prominently features a character who acts cold and hostile in order to mask warmer emotions.

tags.name: Food
tags.description: Centers around cooking or food appraisal.

tags.name: Martial Arts
tags.description: Centers around the use of traditional hand-to-hand combat.

tags.name: Butler
tags.description: Prominently features a character who is a butler.

tags.name: Maids
tags.description: Prominently features a character who is a maid.

tags.name: Age Gap
tags.description: Prominently features romantic relations between people with a significant age difference.

tags.name: Bisexual
tags.description: Features a character who is romantically or sexually attracted to people of more than one sex or gender.

name.native: ハナバタ・ノーキンス

node.description: [Twitter](https://twitter.com/magyo_)
[Twitter](https://twitter.com/asasasa94332163)

[Twitter](https://twitter.com/i/user/231414719)

Originating from [Madhouse](https://anilist.co/studio/11/)'s photography department.
[Twitter](https://twitter.com/negiosyo)

Her involvement in the game and anime Kimi ga Nozomu Eien, where she voiced the role of one of the heroines, Haruka Suzumiya and performed and penned the theme songs and other songs relating to the series, has brought her much attention. Her single "Precious Memories", used as the opening theme song for the series' animated version was a success; it had a peak ranking of 17th place on the Oricon charts and charted for 13 weeks.[1] She has since performed songs for other games and anime, including series such as Muv-Luv, Chrono Crusade, My-HiME, My-Otome, and School Days.    Kuribayashi has performed as part of the group Wild 3nin Musume, whose other present members are Joy Max (a.k.a. Joy Max Maximum) and Kisho Taniyama (a.k.a. Jackie Yang). She also once paired with Chiaki Takahashi to form the group exige, where Takahashi was known as CT. Veronica.(From Wiki)

[Website](http://sasakisayaka.com/)

Winner of 3rd Anisong Grand Prix and debut at singing 2nd OP of Tatakau Shisho: The Book of Bantorra.
